name: D.Va
description: D.Va’s mech is nimble and powerful—its twin Fusion Cannons blast away with autofire at short range, and she can use its Boosters to barrel over enemies and obstacles, or deflect attacks with her projectile-dismantling Defense Matrix.
affiliation: Mobile Exo-Force of the Korean Army

abilities.name: Fusion Cannons
abilities.description: D.Va's mech is equipped with twin short-range rotating cannons. They lay down continuous, high-damage fire without needing to reload, but slow D.Va’s movement while they’re active.

abilities.name: Boosters
abilities.description: D.Va’s mech launches into the air, her momentum carrying her forward. She can turn and change directions or barrel through her enemies, knocking them back.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix
abilities.description: D.Va can activate this forward-facing targeting array to shoot incoming projectiles out of the air.

abilities.name: Eject
abilities.description: D.Va ejects out of her mech when it is destroyed.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: D.Va ejects from her mech and sets its reactor to explode, dealing massive damage to nearby opponents.

abilities.name: Light Gun
abilities.description: While outside of her mech, D.Va can continue the fight with a mid-range automatic blaster.

abilities.name: Call Mech
abilities.description: If her armored battle suit is destroyed, D.Va can call down a fresh mech and return to the fray.
